name: Manufacturers' Inventory
overview:
Manufacturers’ Inventory turns your idle inventory into cash with little time and effort. Our lean culture company understands how to help you achieve your lean initiatives and company goals. By providing manufacturers access to a worldwide shipping/sales channel, and efficient upload technology - Manufacturers’ Inventory allows its sellers an efficient way to increase value added space in your warehouse and reduce waste–all in our B2B marketplace. We provide buyers access to legacy parts with best pricing and fast delivery time because of our direct relationship with each seller. Our solution represents the next improvement in a lean production process from parts distribution, machine assembly, and production line manufacturing.

The website will go live in May.
